tr.td:
Welcome to GroundWork Community Edition v5.3.0
To get started: Use the drop-down menu at the top left to navigate to different views of your monitored environment.
Learn more: Navigate to the "Bookshelf" menu item to learn more about the GroundWork capabilities.
Support: To get help with GroundWork Monitor, visit our Community Forums.
Build reference: build_date_time
